title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.9 - Additional submissions to record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.9 - Additional submissions to record

State Regulations

The commissioner may require the service and filing of
submissions in addition to those served in accordance with sections
281.6
and
281.7
of this Part upon such terms
and conditions as he may specify. The commissioner may, in his discretion, in
the determination of an appeal, take into consideration any official records or
reports on file in the Education Department which relate to issues involved in
such appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
281.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
